text: You arrive at the ER in a haze of fluorescent lighting and bodily fluids. A woman vomits into a plastic bag beside you. The smell is... sharp.
Your partner tries to help you out of the car, despite the pain shooting down his legs. You lock eyes. This is love. And also probably a HIPAA violation.

choices.text: 🪑 Collapse into a waiting room chair and pray for an outlet.
📱 Start filming a TikTok about the horror show around you.
🙄 Complain to the front desk — it's been five seconds already.
